content:
NumberCultureSource Enum

Definition

Specifies how the culture for numbers in a text run is determined.

In this Article

public enum NumberCultureSource
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
NumberCultureSource

Remarks

The NumberSubstitution class uses the enumerated values of the NumberCultureSource class to determine how numbers are displayed.

Fields

Override

Number culture is derived from the stem.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride* property.
Text

Default. Number culture is derived from the value of the stem.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.CultureInfo* property, which is the culture of the text run. In markup, this is represented by the xml:lang attribute.
User

Number culture is derived from the culture value of the current thread, which by default is the user default culture.
